subject: College Athletics
Football
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: North Carolina dismisses its football coach over concerns that the past year of turmoil amid an N.C.A.A. investigation was damaging to the university’s reputation.
snippet: North Carolina dismisses its football coach over concerns that the past year of turmoil amid an N.C.A.A. investigation was damaging to the university’s reputation.
